text: Annex Vassal||Click this button to annex the selected faction. If greyed out, the selected faction is either not your vassal or it has not yet been 20 turns since they have been vassalized.
Change Capital||Move your capital to this region. This will open a prompt.
Decisions||Enact decisions that can impact your realm or ruler.
Gift Region to Ally||Open a list of allies and vassals to gift this region to.
Holy Roman Empire||View the Holy Roman Empire panel and interact with its member states.
Papacy||View the Papacy panel and take actions as the Papal controller.
Release Buffer State||Release a vassalized buffer state faction in this region.

Trade Regions||Click this button to open the diplomacy panel for region trading. If greyed out, the selected faction is ineligible for region trading with you, likely due to either being at war or having insufficient tradable regions.
This faction is a member of the Holy Roman Empire!
Run Executable to Increase Hardcoded Building Slot Limit?
Run Executable to Change Capital to dy_region?
This tab shows details of the selected Holy Roman Empire member state, as well as election options.
This tab, interactable with only by the emperor, contains imperial decrees which can be enacted with various boons and drawbacks.

Check this box to enable Ironman mode.||- Enables MK1212's achievements.\\n- Forcibly enables the Lucky Nations setting.\\n- Manual saving is disabled.\\n- The game automatically saves at the start and end of your turn.\\n- The game automatically saves before and after battles.\\n- The game automatically saves when war is declared by or upon you, or when a peace deal is made.
Check this box to enable Lucky Nations.||- Grants certain AI factions small bonuses to autoresolve, recruitment, and income.\\n - This setting helps certain AI factions survive into the late game.

Crusader Unit||This unit is available due to this army being on crusade. Crusader units can be recruited for free during crusades in regions that are majority-Catholic. However, they are limited in number and do not replenish until the next Crusade.
Confirming will open an invite to the MK1212 Discord in your internet browser.

In order to increase the hardcoded UI limit of building slots for regions from 6 to 10, an executable file that increases the hardcoded value in memory will need to be run. Accepting this prompt will extract an executable embedded in the script to the game's directory and run it.\\n\\nNOTE: THIS WILL ONLY WORK ON WINDOWS OPERATING SYSTEMS

In order to change your capital, the scripts will automatically save your game, modify it with an executable and then reload the campaign from the modified save. If you are on Legendary difficulty, you will need to manually reload your save in order for it to work.\\n\\nNOTE: THIS WILL ONLY WORK ON WINDOWS OPERATING SYSTEMS

His Holiness has passed on to Heaven, and now the College of Cardinals must convene to elect a new Pope from amongst their ranks. As your faction has at least one priest in the College of Cardinals, you will be able to cast your vote to help determine who the next Pope shall be.
